Original: 有很多植物雞尾酒。偶然來到這家店，裡面有當地的顧客，很熱鬧，現場音樂表演。看來你也可以提出要求。
EN: There are many plant cocktails.Occasionally, I came to this shop, with local customers, very lively, live music performances.It seems that you can also make a request.

Original: 這家休閒酒吧位於台北夜市的中心地帶，超出了人們的預期。周圍熙熙攘攘的市場氛圍，散發著良好的氛圍。講英語的調酒師增添了熱情的氛圍，讓國際遊客也能輕鬆融入其中。其突出特點是當地製作的雞尾酒，展示了獨特的混合風味。對於那些在充滿活力的台北夜生活場景中尋求獨特酒吧體驗的人來說，這是一個隱藏的寶石。
EN: This leisure bar is located in the center of the Taipei Night Market, exceeding people's expectations.The bustling market atmosphere around it exudes a good atmosphere.The English bartender adds a enthusiastic atmosphere, allowing international tourists to easily integrate into it.Its prominent feature is the cocktail made locally, showing a unique mixed flavor.This is a hidden gem for those who seek a unique bar experience in the vibrant Taipei nightlife scene.

Original: 台北夜市的Speak Easy酒吧。有時他們有很棒的現場音樂。很棒的雞尾酒和氛圍。如果你在台北著名的夜市找到這家酒吧，那麼你很幸運。向調酒師詢問您最喜歡的配料，他會為您調製出最適合您的配料。祝您度過愉快的時光並享用美味的飲料。玩得開心！
EN: The Speak Easy Bar of Taipei Night Market.Sometimes they have great live music.A great cocktail and atmosphere.If you find this bar at the famous night market in Taipei, then you are lucky.Ask the bartender to ask your favorite ingredients, he will prepare you the most suitable ingredients for you.I wish you a happy time and enjoy delicious drinks.have fun!

Original: 一進店就能聽到駐場歌手好聽的歌曲。整個店裡的氣氛非常熱鬧。強烈推薦大家逛完夜市後放鬆一下。
EN: As soon as you enter the store, you can hear the good songs of the singer singer.The atmosphere in the entire store is very lively.Strongly recommend everyone to relax after going through the night market.

Original: 美味的披薩。裡面的酒杯和氣氛也很好，調酒師調製的飲料也很好喝。絕對推薦。
